snippet: The cherry blossom trees in the Tidal Basin in Washington, given by Japan 100 years ago, are world famous. But Japan gave almost as many cherry trees to New York in 1912.
abstract: The cherry blossom trees in the Tidal Basin in Washington, given by Japan 100 years ago, are world famous. But Japan gave almost as many cherry trees to New York in 1912.

headline.main: Gifts From Japan, Less Celebrated in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Gifts From Japan, Less Celebrated in Manhattan
